name: Sytheon Demo
description:
(One of my very first projects)

-Created with RPG Maker MV

Nyree Kahlin is a wanted criminal for a crime she didn't commit, and is finally caught by Lynn and Niel Delonious, two noble siblings with contradicting personalities. 

But once their mother is killed by an unknown enemy, they are forced to work together to stop this incoming threat.

Hopefully once and for all.
